DOC.criteria: Sedentary ( 2 session structure moderate intensity aerobic exercise resistance training per week ) Overweight ( BMI 2529.9 kg/m2 ) Personal history major illness ( i.e . cardiovascular disease , diabetes , hypertension , cancer , renal/liver impairment , major psychiatric disorder , eat disorder etc . ) History chest pain ( either rest exercise . ) Abnormal rest ECG screen visit Chronic use prescribe nonprescribed medication ( i.e . antihypertensive , statin , metformin , antiinflammatories , antidepressant etc . ) Blood pressure blood lipid outside reference range Serum ferritin < 30ng/mL Uncontrolled asthma , current fever , upper respiratory infection Current intake > 140g alcohol/week Current smoker cigarettes/cigars/marijuana Current intake illicit substance Experience claustrophobia confine space Donated blood past 3 month Migraines Unable comprehend study protocol Unable perform exercise cycle ergometer second screening visit
